com.sleepycat.db

Class ReplicationManagerConnectionStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepycat.db.ReplicationManagerConnectionStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class ReplicationManagerConnectionStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Describes the connection status of a replication site. Returned from the ReplicationManagerSiteInfo.getConnectionStatus() method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ReplicationManagerConnectionStatus CONNECTED
      The site is connected.
      static ReplicationManagerConnectionStatus DISCONNECTED
      The site is disconnected.
      static ReplicationManagerConnectionStatus UNKNOWN
      The connection status cannot be determined.
